data.title: Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers
data.meta-description: Used Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers in stock at American Surplus. Nationwide shipping available!
data.related: <1>Multiton Swift EMC-62 Stackers</1> <2>Crown PE 4500 Series Electric Pallet Jacks</2> <3>Crown 3540-80 Electric Pallet Jacks</3> <4>Crown WP-2300 Series Electric Pallet Jacks</4> <5>Crown PTH-50 Manual Pallet Jacks</5>

image.name: Crown20MStacker2.png
image.placement: gallery 0 1 Crown 20M Electric Stackers, 57" Lift Height

ul.li: Capable of lifting 2,000 lb. loads up to 57" in the air
More maneuverable than a standard lift truck
24V Battery and Used 24V Battery Charger included with purchase!

long-description.p: Used Crown 20M Walk-Behind Electric Stackers are now in stock at American Surplus! This powerful electric stacker is designed with maneuverability in mind -- with controls and a profile similar to that of an Electric Pallet Jack! However, where pallet jacks and stackers differ is in lift height; While an electric pallet jack (such as the Crown WP-2335) may only offer up to 6" of lift height, a Crown 20M Electric Stacker provides up to 57"! With a significantly increased lift height, your staff can efficiently stack pallets and even place product on lower racks while still using the same pallet jack workflow they're comfortable with.

These units have an incredible battery life and utilize four 6 Volt batteries to make up the 24 Volt system. This is also a strong powerful unit capable of handling heavy loads up to 2,000 lbs. which allows you to double stack. The advanced design of the handle allows for simple and easy control by the operator. There 3 directions of in which the handle may be used: forward, reverse, and neutral. The handle is also designed to have a 200° turn radius allows for a great turning radius. When the spring loaded handle is returned to the vertical position it automatically applies the brake for safety. The unit comes standard with 5" wheels on steel casters.

All used stackers from ASI are cleaned, painted and have a 30 day ASI guarantee. We make sure all functions are operational when you receive your stacker.We canâ€™t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used stackers 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.Call our sales team at (800) 876-3736 today to speak with our experienced sales team about adding Crown M20 Walk-Behind Electric Stackers to your fleet today!
